Workflow

From idea to device builds

Follow the loop below whenever you add a feature. You get fast iteration on the web and immediate parity on devices.

Prototype in Astro

Use fast refresh and content collections to model your features without native build overhead.

Style with Tailwind

Keep design tokens and responsive tweaks inline, then layer on DaisyUI patterns when you need polish.

Sync to Devices

Run npm run build and npx cap sync to push the latest web output into Android and iOS containers.

Ready to wire in native plugins?

Run npx cap open android or npx cap open ios after a sync to jump straight into native IDEs. Camera, notifications, and more are a plugin away.
